contentrichtext.text: {{notability|date=June 2010}} {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} '''Zootopia''' is an annual summer concert put on by [[New York]] top-40 radio station [[WHTZ|Z100]]. The show is usually performed in either New York or [[New Jersey]] and includes the artists who garner great airplay on the station in the year. ==2010-2012== There was no Zootopia in these years. == 2009 Zootopia performers<ref>{{cite web|title=Zootopia 2009|url=http://www.z100.com/pages/events/zootopia/2009.html|work=Z100|publisher=Z100|accessdate=09 February 2013}}</ref> == * [[The Black Eyed Peas]] * [[Kelly Clarkson]] * [[The All-American Rejects]] * [[Ciara]] * [[Flo Rida]] * [[Jesse McCartney]] * [[Soulja Boy]] == 2008 Zootopia performers<ref>{{cite web|title=Z100's Zootopia 2008|url=http://www.z100.com/pages/events/zootopia/2008.html|work=Z100|publisher=Z100|accessdate=10 February 2013}}</ref> == * [[Jonas Brothers]] * [[Jesse McCartney]] * [[Danity Kane]] * [[Ferras]] * [[Gavin Degraw]] * [[New Kids on the Block]] * [[OneRepublic]] * [[Sara Bareilles]] * [[Simple Plan]] * [[Miley Cyrus]] == 2007 Zootopia performers<ref>{{cite web|title=Z100's Zootopia 2007|url=http://www.z100.com/pages/events/zootopia/2007.html|work=Z100|publisher=Z100|accessdate=10 February 2013}}</ref> == * [[Maroon 5]] * [[Gym Class Heroes]] * [[Hinder]] * [[Robin Thicke]] * [[Fergie (singer)|Fergie]] * [[Omarion]] * [[Rihanna]] * [[Dashboard Confessional]] * [[Hilary Duff]] ==2006== There was no Zootopia in this year. == 2005 Zootopia performers<ref>{{cite web|title=Z100's Zootopia 2005|url=http://www.z100.com/pages/events/zootopia/2005.html|work=Z100|publisher=Z100|accessdate=10 February 2013}}</ref> == * [[Jennifer Lopez]] * [[Simple Plan]] * [[Backstreet Boys]] * [[The Black Eyed Peas]] * [[Gwen Stefani]] * [[Kelly Clarkson]] * [[Jesse McCartney]] * [[Gavin DeGraw]] * [[Rob Thomas (musician)|Rob Thomas]] == 2004 Zootopia performers<ref>{{cite web|title=Z100's Zootopia 2004|url=http://www.z100.com/pages/events/zootopia/2004.html|work=Z100|publisher=Z100|accessdate=10 February 2013}}</ref> == * [[Jessica Simpson]] * [[Maroon 5]] * [[Avril Lavigne]] * [[Liz Phair]] * [[William Hung]] * [[Mario Winans]] * [[J-Kwon]] * [[Backstreet Boys]] * [[Switchfoot]] * [[The Black Eyed Peas]] == 2003 Zootopia performers<ref>{{cite web|title=Z100's Zootopia 2003|url=http://www.z100.com/pages/events/zootopia/2003.html|work=Z100|publisher=Z100|accessdate=10 February 2013}}</ref> == * [[TLC (band)|TLC]] final group performance * [[Aerosmith]] * [[Mariah Carey]] * [[Ja Rule]] * [[Ashanti (entertainer)|Ashanti]] * [[Jewel (singer)|Jewel]] * [[Third Eye Blind]] * [[Daniel Bedingfield]] * [[Wayne Wonder]] * [[Simple Plan]] * [[Tanto Metro & Devonte]] * [[Kelly Clarkson]] * [[Clay Aiken]] * [[Ruben Studdard]] * [[JC Chasez]] * [[Bowling For Soup]] * [[Ginuwine]] == 2002 Zootopia performers == * [[Marc Anthony]] * [[Mary J. Blige]] * [[Bon Jovi]] * [[Michelle Branch]] * [[Aaron Carter]] * [[Nick Carter (musician)|Nick Carter]] * [[Craig David]] * [[Vanessa Carlton]] * [[Celine Dion]] * [[P. Diddy]] * [[Jay-Z]] * [[Busta Rhymes]] * [[The Goo Goo Dolls]] * [[Fat Joe]] * [[Alanis Morissette]] * [[Outkast]] * [[Pink (singer)|Pink]] * [[Shakira]] == 2001 Zootopia performers == * [[Aerosmith]] * [[Shaggy (musician)|Shaggy]] * [[Pink (singer)|Pink]] * [[Jessica Simpson]] * [[Lifehouse (band)|Lifehouse]] * [[3LW]] * [[Nelly Furtado]] * [[The Corrs]] * [[O Town]] * [[Eden's Crush]] * [[Nelly]] == 2000 Zootopia performers == * [[Christina Aguilera]] * [[Sugar Ray]] * [[Macy Gray]] * [[The Goo Goo Dolls]] * [[Destiny's Child]] * [[Savage Garden]] * [[Jessica Simpson]] * [[Vitamin C (artist)|Vitamin C]] * [[Mandy Moore]] * [[Hanson (band)|Hanson]] == 1999 Zootopia performers == * [[98 Degrees]] * [[Sugar Ray]] * [[Britney Spears]] * [[Joey McIntyre]] * [[Jordan Knight]] * [[Sixpence None the Richer]] * [[UB40]] ==References== *In the game ''[[Super Monkey Ball Adventure]]'', the world Zootopia is based upon the real-world Zootopia. {{Reflist}} [[Category:Music festivals in the United States]] {{US-radio-show-stub}}
